title: Clarence Thomas Secretly Participated in Koch Network Donor Events
summary: Investigation reveals Justice Thomas attended multiple Koch brothers donor summits over the years while Koch network brings coordinated cases to Supreme Court, raising serious ethics concerns

sources.title: Durbin calls for Thomas recusal from Loper Bright
Clarence Thomas Secretly Participated in Koch Network Donor Events

notes: Thomas attended at least two Koch donor summits over the years according to three former network employees and one major donor. Koch network spent 15 years building legal infrastructure to bring cases. Note - Alito's attendance at Koch events not substantiated, though he has separate donor ethics issues.
